text: @atrupar Well, sadly since he was exposed to the Coronavirus by one of his fellow Republicans, perhaps he will do the right thing and reconsider the serious nature of it. I just Hope that he doesn't spread the Infection to other people & places amongst Americans, Brazilians & Europeans.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
